summary:
Piper TTS adapter (CLI-based, CPU-friendly). Supports a dry-run mode (env ABM_PIPER_DRYRUN=1) that writes a short silence WAV
so unit tests can run without Piper installed.

top_level_symbols.name: PiperAdapter
top_level_symbols.doc:
Adapter that calls the `piper` CLI per synthesis request. Attributes:
    voice: Piper voice identifier (e.g., 'en_US-ryan-medium').

top_level_symbols.name: _write_silence_wav
top_level_symbols.doc:
Write a short 16-bit PCM mono silence WAV. Args:
    path: Output file path.
